testcase.name: workflow YAML exists when README references GitHub Actions workflows()

failure.message: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: README references GitHub Actions workflows but no standard workflow YAML found: [.github/workflows/build.yml, .github/workflows/build.yaml, .github/workflows/ci.yml, .github/workflows/ci.yaml] ==> expected: <true> but was: <false>
